comments.body: This module is very high up on my lsit of things that should go. I think it's possible once we've switched to `haskell-lsp`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +4,8 @@-- | An extended version of "Data.Aeson.TH", which provides our own
-- 'daAesonEncodingOptions' and the corresponding 'deriveDAJSON'.
module Data.Aeson.TH.Extended
    ( module Data.Aeson.TH
